languages.text: "Мы не могли допустить подобного. Когда судно пошло на сближение, мы пронзили его сотней орудий, а после ликовали: ибо среди обломков рейнджеры не нашли и следа предвиденного проклятия. Азуриан, как же мы ошибались. Корабли, что вернулись с разведки в наши звездные гавани, уже несли его на своих крыльях. Будь то царапина от пролетевшего мимо обломка или зараженный прах мон-кайского судна, что не успели развеять космические ветры... Чума пробралась в наш дом, и сразу же принялась разъедать саму плоть мира-корабля".

"We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

Когда судно пошло на сближение, мы пронзили его сотней орудий, а после ликовали: ибо среди обломков рейнджеры не нашли и следа предвиденного проклятия. Азуриан, как же мы ошибались. Чума пробралась в наш дом, и сразу же принялась разъедать саму плоть мира-корабля".

languages.text: "Das konnten wir nicht zulassen. Als das Schiff auftauchte, haben wir es mit Hunderten von Salven empfangen und dann gejubelt, weil die Ranger im Wrack keine Hinweise auf den prophezeiten Fluch entdeckten. Asuryan, was für ein Irrtum. Die Schiffe, die von ihrem Erkundungsflug in unsere Raumhäfen zurückkehrten, trugen ihn bereits auf ihren Flügeln. Egal, ob es ein Kratzer eines vorbeitreibenden Wracks oder die infizierte Asche des Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffs war, die der kosmische Wind nicht rechtzeitig verstreuen konnte ... Die Seuche kroch in unser zu Hause und fraß sich sofort durch das Fleisch des Weltenschiffs."
languages.original_text: "We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Das konnten wir nicht zulassen. Als das Schiff auftauchte, haben wir es mit Hunderten von Salven empfangen und dann gejubelt, weil die Ranger im Wrack keine Hinweise auf den prophezeiten Fluch entdeckten. Asuryan, was für ein Irrtum. Die Schiffe, die von ihrem Erkundungsflug in unsere Raumhäfen zurückkehrten, trugen ihn bereits auf ihren Flügeln. Egal, ob es ein Kratzer eines vorbeitreibenden Wracks oder die infizierte Asche des Chem-Pan-Sey-Schiffs war, die der kosmische Wind nicht rechtzeitig verstreuen konnte ... Die Seuche kroch in unser zu Hause und fraß sich sofort durch das Fleisch des Weltenschiffs."

languages.text: « Nous ne pouvions pas laisser une telle chose se produire. Lorsque le vaisseau s'est approché, nous l'avons transpercé de centaines de salves, puis nous nous sommes réjouis lorsque les rangers nous ont appris qu'ils n'avaient trouvé aucune trace de la malédiction dans l'épave. Ô Asuryan, comme nous avions tort... Nos vaisseaux de reconnaissance la transportaient déjà sur leurs ailes lors de leur retour à nos astroports, dans les éraflures causées par les débris ou les cendres infectées du vaisseau mon-keigh que les vents cosmiques n'avaient pas encore dispersées... Ainsi, le fléau s'est infiltré à bord de notre vaisseau-monde et a immédiatement commencé à ronger sa chair. »
languages.original_text: "We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne pouvions pas laisser une telle chose se produire. Lorsque le vaisseau s'est approché, nous l'avons transpercé de centaines de salves, puis nous nous sommes réjouis lorsque les rangers nous ont appris qu'ils n'avaient trouvé aucune trace de la malédiction dans l'épave. Ô Asuryan, comme nous avions tort... Nos vaisseaux de reconnaissance la transportaient déjà sur leurs ailes lors de leur retour à nos astroports, dans les éraflures causées par les débris ou les cendres infectées du vaisseau mon-keigh que les vents cosmiques n'avaient pas encore dispersées... Ainsi, le fléau s'est infiltré à bord de notre vaisseau-monde et a immédiatement commencé à ronger sa chair. »

languages.text: “我们决不允许这样的事情发生。当那艘船接近时，我们发射了数十轮齐射，将它化为碎片。之后，我们欢呼起来，因为在飞船的残骸之中，我们的游侠并没有看到诅咒的痕迹。可阿苏焉在上，我们大错特错，诅咒已经附在了我们的侦察舰上，随它一起回到了星港。那种诅咒或许来自其他舰船残骸造成的划痕，又或许来自猴子舰船残骸尚未冷却的余烬……瘟疫悄悄潜入了我们的家园，吞噬着方舟世界的血肉。”
languages.original_text: "We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

traits.locale_text: “我们决不允许这样的事情发生。当那艘船接近时，我们发射了数十轮齐射，将它化为碎片。之后，我们欢呼起来，因为在飞船的残骸之中，我们的游侠并没有看到诅咒的痕迹。可阿苏焉在上，我们大错特错，诅咒已经附在了我们的侦察舰上，随它一起回到了星港。那种诅咒或许来自其他舰船残骸造成的划痕，又或许来自猴子舰船残骸尚未冷却的余烬……瘟疫悄悄潜入了我们的家园，吞噬着方舟世界的血肉。”

languages.text: «No podíamos tolerar algo así. Cuando la nave se aproximó, la atravesamos con un centenar de andanadas y nos regocijamos, pues los exploradores no encontraron rastro de la maldición prevista entre sus restos. Asuryan, cuánto nos equivocamos. Las naves de reconocimiento que volvieron a nuestros puertos estelares ya la portaban en las alas. Fuera por un arañazo durante el viaje o por cenizas infectadas de la nave mon-keigh que los vientos cósmicos aún no hubieran dispersado... la plaga se infiltró en nuestro hogar, y en ese mismo instante comenzó a devorar la carne de nuestro mundo astronave».
languages.original_text: "We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

traits.locale_text: «No podíamos tolerar algo así. Cuando la nave se aproximó, la atravesamos con un centenar de andanadas y nos regocijamos, pues los exploradores no encontraron rastro de la maldición prevista entre sus restos. Asuryan, cuánto nos equivocamos. Las naves de reconocimiento que volvieron a nuestros puertos estelares ya la portaban en las alas. Fuera por un arañazo durante el viaje o por cenizas infectadas de la nave mon-keigh que los vientos cósmicos aún no hubieran dispersado... la plaga se infiltró en nuestro hogar, y en ese mismo instante comenzó a devorar la carne de nuestro mundo astronave».

languages.text: 「そんなことを許すわけにはいかなかったのだ。船が近づいてきたとき、我らは100発の砲弾で船を打ち抜いて勝利を喜んだ。レンジャーたちが、残骸の中に、あるだろうと思っていた呪いの痕跡を見つけることがなかったがために。アシュリアン、我々は完全に間違っていた。こちらのスターポートに偵察から戻ってきた船が、その翼に呪いを受けていたんだ。漂流していた難破船によるかすり傷か、それとも宇宙風が吹き飛ばしきれなかったモン＝ケイ号の汚染された灰によるものか…疫病は我らの故郷へと忍び込み、方舟の体そのものを蝕み始めた」
languages.original_text: "We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことを許すわけにはいかなかったのだ。船が近づいてきたとき、我らは100発の砲弾で船を打ち抜いて勝利を喜んだ。レンジャーたちが、残骸の中に、あるだろうと思っていた呪いの痕跡を見つけることがなかったがために。アシュリアン、我々は完全に間違っていた。こちらのスターポートに偵察から戻ってきた船が、その翼に呪いを受けていたんだ。漂流していた難破船によるかすり傷か、それとも宇宙風が吹き飛ばしきれなかったモン＝ケイ号の汚染された灰によるものか…疫病は我らの故郷へと忍び込み、方舟の体そのものを蝕み始めた」

languages.text: "Böyle bir hadisenin vuku bulmasına müsaade edemezdik. Gemi yaklaştığında yüzlerce kez yaylım ateşi açıp onu delik deşik ettik. Sonrasında korucuların enkaz içinde öngörülen lanetin en ufak bir emaresini bile bulamamaları bizi neşeye boğdu. Asuryan, nasıl da yanılmışız. Gözlem sonrası yıldız limanlarımıza dönen gemiler, o laneti kanatlarında taşımış. Geçilen enkazdan alınan bir çizik mi yoksa mon-keigh gemisinden aldığımız, kozmik rüzgârların dağıtmaya fırsatı olmadığı hastalıklı küller mi bilinmez... Neticede salgın, yuvamıza sinsice girip gemidünyayı bir anda çürütmeye başladı."
languages.original_text: "We could not allow such a thing to happen. When the ship approached, we pierced it with a hundred salvos, and then rejoiced: for among the wreckage the rangers found no trace of the foreseen curse. Asuryan, how wrong we were. The ships that returned from their reconnaissance to our starports were already carrying it on their wings. Whether it was a scratch from a passing wreck or the infected ashes of the mon-keigh ship that the cosmic winds had not had time to disperse... The plague crept into our home, and immediately began to eat away at the craftworld's very flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir hadisenin vuku bulmasına müsaade edemezdik. Gemi yaklaştığında yüzlerce yaylım ateşiyle onu delik deşik ettik. Ardından kolcuların enkaz içinde öngörülen lanetin en ufak bir emaresini bile bulamamaları bizi neşeyle doldurdu. Ah, nasıl da yanılmıştık. Yıldız limanlarımıza gözlemden dönen gemiler, o laneti kanatlarında taşıyorlardı bile. Geçilen enkazdan alınan bir çizik miydi yoksa mon-keigh gemisinin kozmik rüzgârların dağıtmaya vakit bulamadığı hastalıklı külleri miydi, bilinmez ama... Salgın, yuvamıza sinsice girdi ve gemidünyanın tüm gövdesini bir anda çürütmeye başladı."
